pr_title: [FLINK-18621][sql-client] Simplify the methods of Executor interface in sql client

timeline.bodyText: According to IteratorUtils.toList, if iterator is null, should throw NPE. I think it is good to be consistent with commons-collections.
timeline.author: JingsongLi

replies.bodyText: keep the same implementation of CollectionUtil#iterableToList
replies.author: godfreyhe
